note.p: Death: The Holne, St Marychurch Road, Torquay (02 April 1886)

Career: Entered the Royal Navy (1828); Lieutenant (1840); Captain (1854); Captina of the Sphinx (1854-1857); was at the bombardment of Sebastopol; Captain of HMS Rattlesnake (1862-1866); Commodore, west coast of Africa (1862-1864); ADC to the Queen (1866-1870); Superintendent, Deptford dockyard (1866-1870); 2nd in command, Channel Squadron (1870-1871); retired (1876); was granted a Greenwich hospital pension of Â£150 (1884)
